scripts.buildd: vite build frontend && cd frontend && firebase deploy
scripts.builds: vite build frontend && cd frontend && firebase hosting:channel:deploy staging
scripts.apie: cd api && firebase functions:config:get > .runtimeconfig.json && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.apied: cd api && firebase functions:config:get > .runtimeconfig.json && firebase --debug emulators:start --only functions
